verses.verse: Then the angel <S%H4397><s%> who was speaking <S%H1696><s%> with me returned, <S%H7725><s%> and roused <S%H5782><s%> me as a man <S%H376><s%> who <S%H834><s%> is awakened <S%H5782><s%> from his sleep. <S%H8142><s%>

And he said <S%H559><s%> to me, "What <S%H4100><s%> do you see <S%H7200><s%>?" And I said, <S%H559><s%> "I see, <S%H7200><s%> and behold, <S%H2009><s%> a lampstand <S%H4501><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%> with its bowl <S%H1543><s%> on the top <S%H7218><s%> of it, and its seven <S%H7651><s%> lamps <S%H5216><s%> on it with seven <S%H7651><s%> spouts <S%H4166><s%> belonging to each of the lamps <S%H5216><s%> which <S%H834><s%> are on the top <S%H7218><s%> of it;

also two <S%H8147><s%> olive <S%H2132><s%> trees <S%H2132><s%> by it, one <S%H259><s%> on the right <S%H3225><s%> side <S%H3225><s%> of the bowl <S%H1543><s%> and the other <S%H259><s%> on its left <S%H8040><s%> side. <S%H8040><s%> "

Then I answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to the angel <S%H4397><s%> who was speaking <S%H1696><s%> with me saying, <S%H559><s%> "What <S%H4100><s%> are these, <S%H428><s%> my lord <S%H113><s%>?"

So the angel <S%H4397><s%> who was speaking <S%H1696><s%> with me answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to me, "Do you not know <S%H3045><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> these <S%H428><s%> are?" And I said, <S%H559><s%> "No, <S%H3808><s%> my lord. <S%H113><s%>"

Then he answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to me, "This <S%H2088><s%> is the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> to Zerubbabel <S%H2216><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> 'Not by might <S%H2428><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> by power, <S%H3581><s%> but by My Spirit, <S%H7307><s%>' says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts. <S%H6635><s%>

'What <S%H4310><s%> are you, O great <S%H1419><s%> mountain <S%H2022><s%>? Before <S%H6440><s%> Zerubbabel <S%H2216><s%> [you will become] a plain; <S%H4334><s%> and he will bring <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> the top <S%H7222><s%> stone <S%H68><s%> with shouts <S%H8663><s%> of "Grace, <S%H2580><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> to it!"' "
Also the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me saying, <S%H559><s%>

"The hands <S%H3027><s%> of Zerubbabel <S%H2216><s%> have laid <S%H3245><s%> the foundation <S%H3245><s%> of this <S%H2088><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> and his hands <S%H3027><s%> will finish <S%H1214><s%> [it.] Then you will know <S%H3045><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> has sent <S%H7971><s%> me to you.

"For who <S%H4310><s%> has despised <S%H936><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> of small <S%H6996><s%> things <S%H6996><s%>? But these <S%H428><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> will be glad <S%H8055><s%> when they see <S%H7200><s%> the plumb <S%H913><s%> <S%H68><s%> line <S%H68><s%> <S%H913><s%> in the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Zerubbabel <S%H2216><s%> â€“ [these are] the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> which <S%H1992><s%> range <S%H7751><s%> to and fro <S%H7751><s%> throughout <S%H3605><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>"

Then I answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, "What <S%H4100><s%> are these <S%H428><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> olive <S%H2132><s%> trees <S%H2132><s%> on the right <S%H3225><s%> of the lampstand <S%H4501><s%> and on its left <S%H8040><s%>?"

And I answered <S%H6030><s%> the second <S%H8145><s%> time <S%H8145><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to him, "What <S%H4100><s%> are the two <S%H8147><s%> olive <S%H2132><s%> branches <S%H7641><s%> which <S%H834><s%> are beside <S%H3027><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> golden <S%H2091><s%> pipes, <S%H6804><s%> which empty <S%H9553><s%> the golden <S%H2091><s%> [oil] from themselves?"
So he answered <S%H559><s%> me saying, <S%H559><s%> "Do you not know <S%H3045><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> these <S%H428><s%> are?" And I said, <S%H559><s%> "No, <S%H3808><s%> my lord. <S%H113><s%>"

Then he said, <S%H559><s%> "These <S%H428><s%> are the two <S%H8147><s%> anointed <S%H1121><s%> <S%H3323><s%> ones, <S%H1121><s%> who are standing <S%H5975><s%> by the Lord <S%H136><s%> of the whole <S%H3605><s%> earth. <S%H776><s%>"
